issue.title: [Java] Transfer validity buffer data word at a time (currently we do byte at a time)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1876](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1876). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
